channel.title: The most immature person I've ever seen
channel.description:
So of a few of you may know I had 'won' an account in the Runescape section. This [b]xxlukexx[/b] is the person I'd won it off of. The message I got back from him consisted of this: [quote="xxlukexx"]UMAD?[/quote] Something needs to be done about this. People can't go around 'giving' these account away and don't give it to the person because they don't know/like them. It goes against the whole 'giving away' idea. Everyone know's that most of them are rigged anyway, so here's a call to arms, against these 'give away threads, THEY MUST be added to the rules in the Runescape Discussion board such as the loaning GP was, they must be banned.
Also before I forget. He also used Si Force to lock the thread before I was able to reply asking for the information and he also blocked my PMs.

item.title: The most immature person I've ever seen
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

If he doesn’t wanna give his account away, well then thats not our problem. You’re both old enough to discuss it. Talk about it with him.

Read full topic
item.source: The most immature person I've ever seen

item.title: The most immature person I've ever seen
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

mihalich:

[rule]No giveaways from here on out.[/rule]

If it’s going to lead to a discussion/thread such as this one, I wouldn’t be surprised it there was a rule such as Mihalich posted. I’m not going to lie, creating a thread about it isn’t going to work.

So I suppose leave it at that mate or somehow get in contact with this member and ask him for the information.

Read full topic
item.source: The most immature person I've ever seen

item.title: The most immature person I've ever seen
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

So of a few of you may know I had ‘won’ an account in the Runescape section. This xxlukexx is the person I’d won it off of. The message I got back from him consisted of this:

xxlukexx:

UMAD?

Something needs to be done about this. People can’t go around ‘giving’ these account away and don’t give it to the person because they don’t know/like them. It goes against the whole ‘giving away’ idea. Everyone know’s that most of them are rigged anyway, so here’s a call to arms, against these 'give away threads, THEY MUST be added to the rules in the Runescape Discussion board such as the loaning GP was, they must be banned.

Also before I forget. He also used Si Force to lock the thread before I was able to reply asking for the information and he also blocked my PMs.

Read full topic
